title: Easter Collection - Duckling Days
description: A sweet Easter fabric collection featuring hand-painted florals, baby ducklings, pastel gingham, and bunny ear motifs — perfect for spring sewing projects! Ideal for baby clothes, children’s Easter outfits, quilts, and handmade nursery decor. These soft, whimsical surface patterns are designed with a vintage-inspired color palette of blush, butter yellow, and dusty blue. A lovely choice for makers, fabric lovers, and children’s clothing brands looking for playful springtime prints.
